summary: The TRICARE Travel Improvement Act (S.2482) amends Title 10 of the United States Code to modify travel expense reimbursements for specialty care under the TRICARE program. The bill reduces the distance threshold for the Secretary of Defense to reimburse travel expenses from 100 miles to 50 miles, with an exception for military retirees and their dependents, who would continue to receive reimbursements for travel exceeding 100 miles. Additionally, the Act clarifies the process for reimbursement.
